pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Welcome To Eulith ClientPlease find our docs at https://docs.eulith.com---## Setup for Linux 22.04~~~sudo apt update -qqsudo apt install -qq -y python3 python3-pippip3 install pyproject.tomlpip3 install web3pip3 install pytestexport PATH=$PATH:$HOME/.local/bin ; echo consider adding this to .bashrc~~~## Running tests~~~pytest~~~or if you use a different URL for where to find the eulith call server~~~EULITH_URL=http://192.168.244.44:7777/v0 pytest~~~
